title: Add support for .txz and .tbz2 file extensions
body:
### Before
```console
$ spack url parse https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-29.txz
==> Parsing URL: https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-29.txz

==> Matched version regex  6: r'^[a-zA-Z\\d+-]+-v?(\\d[\\da-zA-Z.]*)$'
==> Matched  name   regex  8: r'^([A-Za-z\\d+\\._-]+)$'

==> Detected:
    https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-29.txz
                                               ---------------------- ~~~~~~
    name:    openkim-models-2019-03
    version: 29.txz

==> Substituting version 9.9.9b:
    https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-9.9.9b
                                               ---------------------- ~~~~~~
$ spack url summary
==> Generating a summary of URL parsing in Spack...

    Total URLs found:          3176
    Names correctly parsed:    2754/3176 (86.71%)
    Versions correctly parsed: 2889/3176 (90.96%)
```

### After
```console
$ spack url parse https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-29.txz
==> Parsing URL: https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-29.txz

==> Matched version regex  0: r'^[a-zA-Z+._-]+[._-]v?(\\d[\\d._-]*)$'
==> Matched  name   regex  8: r'^([A-Za-z\\d+\\._-]+)$'

==> Detected:
    https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-2019-03-29.txz
                                               -------------- ~~~~~~~~~~
    name:    openkim-models
    version: 2019-03-29

==> Substituting version 9.9.9b:
    https://s3.openkim.org/archives/collection/openkim-models-9.9.9b.txz
                                               -------------- ~~~~~~
$ spack url summary
==> Generating a summary of URL parsing in Spack...

    Total URLs found:          3175
    Names correctly parsed:    2755/3175 (86.77%)
    Versions correctly parsed: 2891/3175 (91.06%)
```

@ellio167
